segments.text: This kitchen's a mess with water pouring everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, clueless as the sink overflows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over there, kids raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's on a stool that's leaning way too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He'll probably drop cookies all over the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's all eager, hand out like it's a game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking treats behind her back—such naughty behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks clean; why can't inside be like that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage incoming; cabinets will be warped.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unfold without intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR
